results.name: Gessel-Stanley triangle read by rows: triangle of coefficients of polynomials arising in connection with enumeration of intransitive trees by number of nodes and number of right nodes.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..141, flattened

A. Postnikov, Intransitive Trees, J. Combin. Theory Ser. A 79 (1997), 360-366.
